```{r in-line code q18}
# total respondents ----
q18a_num_answers <- meds2024_before_clean |> 
  select(prob_dist) |> 
  count() |> 
  pull()

# total not answer 1 ----
q18a_not1 <- meds2024_before_clean |> 
  select(prob_dist) |> 
  group_by(prob_dist) |>
  filter(prob_dist != "1 (never heard of it)") |> 
  count() |>
  ungroup() |> 
  summarize(n = sum(n)) |> 
  pull()

# answered 1 ----
q18a_1 <- meds2024_before_clean |> 
  select(prob_dist) |> 
  group_by(prob_dist) |>
  filter(prob_dist == "1 (never heard of it)") |> 
  count() |>
  ungroup() |> 
  summarize(n = sum(n)) |> 
  pull()
```
